response.content:
{"tool_name":"query_postgres","arguments":{"query":"SELECT n.nspname AS schema_name,
       c.relname AS table_name,
       pg_catalog.pg_size_pretty(pg_total_relation_size(c.oid)) AS total_size,
       pg_catalog.pg_size_pretty(pg_relation_size(c.oid)) AS table_size,
       pg_catalog.pg_size_pretty(pg_total_relation_size(c.oid) - pg_relation_size(c.oid)) AS indexes_size,
       c.reltuples::bigint AS approx_row_count,
       obj_description(c.oid, 'pg_class') AS table_comment
FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c
JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
WHERE c.relkind = 'r'
  AND n.nspname = 'public'
ORDER BY c.relname;"} }
